trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access an object across application domain and process boundaries.
When you implement IRemoteObjectContract on a type, components can use the contract to access type information for objects of the type.

Components access type information by calling the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to obtain an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>.
The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> interface defines a contract that components can use to access specific type and member information, and to invoke members.

Returns an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> that specifies the type of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref>.
Use the GetRemoteType method to access the members of the remote object that the current <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> identifies.
An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> that specifies the type of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref>.
Casts the object identified by the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref> to a specified type.
The canonical name of the type to cast the object to.
A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that represents the result of the cast operation.
